contents.rollMessage:
Muscle Check

Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$
Target score (Mod: ${totalModifier:=?{modifier:"Choose a modifier"|0|40|20|-20|-40} + hidmusmod + hidglobalmod}$): ${muscleValue:=muscle + totalModifier}$
+Hits: ${additionalHits:=?{plusHits:"+Hits:"[number]}}$
Outcome: ${roll <= 5 ? 'Critical Hit' : (roll >= 96 ? 'Fumble' : (roll <= muscleValue ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical Hit' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble' : 'Failure')))}$
Hits: ${hits:= (roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? (roll <= muscleValue ? max(floor(muscleValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1 + additionalHits, 6) : min(floor(muscleValue/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6)) : (roll <= 5 ? max(floor(muscleValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1, 6) : (roll >= 96 ? min(floor(muscleValue/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6) : (roll <= muscleValue ? floor(muscleValue/10) - floor(roll/10) + additionalHits : floor(muscleValue/10 - floor(roll/10)))))}$

contents.value:
Retina Overload. This Condition inflicts a ${blindquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • Sight-based Checks (Blind).
    • Removed by:
  • Cleaning out the eyes (Blind).

Ringing in Ears. This Condition inflicts a ${deafquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • Hearing & Speech-based Checks (Deaf).
    • Removed by:
  • Removing blockage (Deaf).

Agony. This Condition inflicts a ${painquanity * -10}$% Check penalty. Passively reduce by one each hour. Impairs:
  • All Checks (Pain).
    • Removed by:
  • A form of painkiller (Pain).

Traitorous Flesh. Whenever you gain three stacks of this Condition, make a Hardship Quarrel vs ${corruptionquanity}$ Hits or become changed. Changes:
  • Mutation (Corruption).
    • Remove by:
  • Painful purification (Corruption).

Profane Thoughts. Whenever you gain three stacks of this Condition, make a Hardship Quarrel vs ${stressquanity}$ Hits or become changed. Changes:
  • Madness (Stress).
    • Remove by:
  • Indulging in Vices (Stress).

Muscle Exhaustion & Burning Lungs. This Condition only takes up Enc slots, but cannot be removed if the source is an active Lingering Quarrel.
Remove by:
  • A good night’s rest.

Grapples, Nets. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Movement (Entangle).
    • Remove by:
  • Slipping or breaking out (Entangle).

Knock Outs. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Actions, Movement & Opponents can inflict any Injury of their choice while in melee (Helpless).
    • Remove by:
  • Receiving Damage (Helpless).

Discombulation. This Condition prevents Actions and/or Movement. Passively reduce by one each round. Prevents:
  • Actions (Stun).
    • Remove by:
  • Smelling salts (Stun).

Pinned in Armor & Slipping in Mud. This Condition inflicts a -20% Check Penalty to you and a +20% Check Modifier to your opponents.
Remove by:
  • Spending an action to stand up.

Broken Bones & Torn Muscles. This Condition inflicts a ${traumaquanity* -20}$% penalty on all Checks involving the Location.
Remove by:
  • Resting one month per Rating.

rowLayout.tooltip: Shift click for Manual Roll
rowLayout.rollMessage:
${sameRow('lingeringquarrelname')}$ Check (Contact)

Roll: ${roll:=[1d100]}$
Target score (Mod: ${totalModifier:=?{modifier:"Choose a modifier"|0|40|20|-20|-40}}$): ${lingering_value:=sameRow('lingerquarrelscore') + totalModifier}$
+Hits: ${additionalHits:=sameRow('lingeringquarrelhits')}$
Outcome: ${roll <= 5 ? 'Critical Hit' : (roll >= 96 ? 'Fumble' : (roll <= lingering_value ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical Hit' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble' : 'Failure')))}$
Hits: ${hits:= (roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? (roll <= lingering_value ? max(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1 + additionalHits, 6) : min(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6)) : (roll <= 5 ? max(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1, 6) : (roll >= 96 ? min(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6) : (roll <= lingering_value ? floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + additionalHits : floor(lingering_value/10 - floor(roll/10)))))}$

Rule: Contacts
Improvement:
Once per session when you use a favor from a contact, there's a 10% chance that they will improve their Quality (Adept to Professional, Professional to Master).
Losing Contacts:
If they Fumble a Check for the Player, the contact becomes unavailable for the rest of the session.
rowLayout.altRollMessage:
${sameRow('lingeringquarrelname')}$ Check (Manual, Contact)

Roll: ${roll:=?{rollValue:"Enter your roll result"|0}}$
Target score (Mod: ${totalModifier:=?{modifier:"Choose a modifier"|0|40|20|-20|-40}}$): ${lingering_value:=sameRow('lingerquarrelscore') + totalModifier}$
+Hits: ${additionalHits:=sameRow('lingeringquarrelhits')}$
Outcome: ${roll <= 5 ? 'Critical Hit' : (roll >= 96 ? 'Fumble' : (roll <= lingering_value ? ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Critical Hit' : 'Success') : ((roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? 'Fumble' : 'Failure')))}$
Hits: ${hits:= (roll % 100) % 11 == 0 ? (roll <= lingering_value ? max(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1 + additionalHits, 6) : min(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6)) : (roll <= 5 ? max(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + 1, 6) : (roll >= 96 ? min(floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) - 1, -6) : (roll <= lingering_value ? floor(lingering_value/10) - floor(roll/10) + additionalHits : floor(lingering_value/10 - floor(roll/10)))))}$
